Title: Ruin
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Sean Hennen, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: Liz abandons her old life for a fresh start in a new place, but she is forced to draw on her emotional and physical strength in a brutal fight when a threat finds her.
